definition: according to/in accordance with/to shine/to illuminate/to reflect/to look at (one's reflection)/to take (a photo)/photo/as requested/as before

sentences.english: The application principles and methods are demonstrated of nuclear radiation technique in gemmology.
sentences.chinese: 闡述了核輻照技術在寶石學中的應用原理和方法。

sentences.english: I am holding a licence to possess the concerned irradiating apparatus.
sentences.chinese: 本人正持有牌照管有該輻照儀器。

sentences.english: The concepts of radiant emittance and of irradiance are complementary.
sentences.chinese: 輻射的發射強度和輻照度是兩個互補的概念。

sentences.english: The surface modification of natural rubber(NR) was carried out by grafting polyorganosiloxane under microwave irradiation.
sentences.chinese: 微波輻照下，用聚硅氧烷對天然橡膠表面進行了處理。

sentences.english: Conclusion Radiation could decrease the antigenicity of homogenous nerve.
sentences.chinese: 結論放射輻照處理降低異體神經的抗原性。

sentences.english: The microwave radiation mutation of the thiobacillus ferrooxidans, called T.
sentences.chinese: 研究微波輻照誘變氧化鐵硫桿菌T。

sentences.english: Once electricity is lost, the irradiated nuclear fuel could begin to melt down.
sentences.chinese: 一旦電力用完，輻照核燃料會逐漸融化。

sentences.english: The rats of drug prevention sub-group were intragastric administrated with Anduolin capsule.
sentences.chinese: 藥物防護組大鼠在輻照前用安多霖藥物灌胃。

sentences.english: The technology to irradiate food has been around for the better part of a century.
sentences.chinese: 在大半個世紀以來輻照食品的技術變得愈加突出。

sentences.english: Methods Bacterial contamination and ultraviolet lamp irradiation intensity were examined.
sentences.chinese: 方法進行細菌污染與紫外線燈輻照度值檢測。

sentences.english: The rate of survival for hybrid seeds, was obviously increased, by the treatment of the irradiation.
sentences.chinese: 輻照對雜種籽粒的完好率有明顯提高。

sentences.english: The freezing-drying Wuchang fish were irradiated to kill bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 本文利用輻照技術對凍幹武昌魚進行殺菌研究。

sentences.english: A method for the preparation of cross-linked polyacrylamide coated capillary by radiation- induced polymerization is presented.
sentences.chinese: 採用輻照法制備交聯聚丙烯酰胺毛細管電泳塗層柱。

sentences.english: A threshold voltage model of DMOS by radiation induced positive spatial charge is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種DMOS輻照正空間電荷閾值電壓模型。

sentences.english: This paper investigated whether clenbuterol degradation would take place when clenbuterol aqueous solution was irradiated by electronic beam.
sentences.chinese: 克倫特羅水溶液在電子束輻照下將發生降解。

sentences.english: The dose-rate effect during irradiation is interpreted.
sentences.chinese: 解釋了輻照過程中的劑量率效應。

definition: radiator (for heating a room)/radiator (for cooling an engine)

pinyin: dian4 nao3 fu3 zhu4 she4 ji4
